home.pageDescription: Your time is precious. Just take 15 minutes a day to find out the news that matters.
mttrs.slogan: Your reading time well spent. Read the news that really matters.
mttrs.download.slogan: Always have your news summary at your reach
onboarding.first.title: Welcome to
onboarding.first.caption: Your reading time well spent. Read the news that really matters.
onboarding.second.title: Top News
onboarding.second.caption: Find the top stories of the day, ordered by the social indexes of the Internet. If its in the mouths of the people, youll find it here.
onboarding.third.title: News Summaries
onboarding.third.caption: Understand the main message of each news in seconds. Summaries are carefully written by our staff.
onboarding.fourth.title: Keep focus
onboarding.fourth.caption: Focus on the information and do not waste time reading the same news several times. If desired, find the publication of your preferred publisher.
onboarding.fifth.title: Your interest in a click
onboarding.fifth.caption: All news are separated into categories. Find everything organized and read about the subjects that interest you most.
onboarding.sixth.title: News articles in your hands
onboarding.sixth.caption: Waiting in line, on the way to work, after lunch or even in the bathroom. At any time or place you keep updated.
